sources.title: Toyota Subsidiary Loses $37 Million Due to BEC Scam
sources.snippet: A European subsidiary of the company, Toyota Boshoku Corporation, was targeted by hackers as part of a business email compromise (BEC) scam. Total financial losses from the BEC scam are reportedly close to $37 million (¥4 billion), and the company is now trying to recover this money with the help of law enforcement officials.
